Paralyze:60+ [9/lvl]
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Mindless [mind], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster overloads the target's mind and effectively paralyzes the target for a very long time.
